group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The study received ethical approval from the University of the Philippines Manila Research Ethics Board UPMREB 2020–0776-01. All procedures followed were in accordance with the ethical standards of the responsible committee on human experimentation (institutional and national) and with the Helsinki Declaration of 1975, as revised in 2000 (5). Informed consent was obtained from all patients being included in the study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.value: This content has been made available to all.
